args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Inadvertent Seat Belt Unlatch

The Office of Defects Investigation (ODI) has received 37 complaints alleging inadvertent unlatching of seat belts in model year (MY) 2020-2023 Hyundai Palisade vehicles manufactured by Hyundai Motor America. The complaints allege that without warning, the seat belts sometimes inadvertently unlatch, increasing the risk of injury due to full loss of seat belt protection in the event of a crash.ODI is opening this Preliminary Evaluation (PE) to determine the scope and severity of the alleged problem and to assess the potential safety-related consequences. To review the ODI reports cited in the Opening Resume ODI Report Identification Number document, go to NHTSA.gov.nan

Number of Units Affected: nan"
